column4: hi im a noob and was wondering if ubuntu would be a good newbie linux distro?
i have been using MDK for @ 2yrs and just moved to ubuntu, apart from the new GUI (using KDE) and getting to learn new qurks of ubuntu i am not doing too badly with it
thin kyou just have to get your feet wet and try it
also find a local lug group in your area, this is only the 2nd time i've really done live chatting and have got some good info.
